name: Nkosi Pridelord
description: The Nkosi Pridelord embodies the power and grace of a lion, capable of transforming into a Large lion. In humanoid form, it wears studded leather armor.
memorable: Its ability to change shape and unleash a powerful roar to empower allies makes it a unique and dangerous opponent.
goals: To command and rally allies in combat while dealing significant damage to foes.
relations: Related to other nkosi, which may be subordinate or allied creatures.
environment: Typically found in open plains or savannah-like terrains.
strengths: Exceptional Strength and Dexterity allow it to excel in melee combat with high damage output.
weaknesses: Average Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma limit its durability and magical influence.
attacks: Can make multiple attacks using either its Bite or Mambele, with special abilities like Pridelord's Roar to enhance allies.
most_powerful_ability: Pounce allows it to knock targets prone and follow up with a powerful Bite attack as a bonus action.
equipment: Studded leather armor in humanoid form.
senses: Has keen smell, giving it an advantage on perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Proficient in Survival skills, enhancing its tracking and wilderness abilities.
additional_information: Can roar to give advantage to allies in combat.
Capable of dealing extra damage with melee attacks due to its Brute feature.
Moves exceptionally fast for a humanoid at 50 ft.
Loses the ability to communicate while in lion form.
test_queries: humanoid that transforms into a lion
powerful shapechanger with a roar ability
lion-like humanoid that can empower allies
brutal melee attacker with high mobility
